site.title: Arthur Revolt
site.description:
This isn't your typical about me because I'm not here to fit into anything. This is just my little corner of the internet, where I put some parts of myself out there.

I'm a student who enjoys building things mostly to solve problems around me or just to make things a little easier. I've always had this urge to create things for myself. Sure, I know we humans depend on each other and no one can build everything alone, but still, I try.

I pick up new hobbies frequently: music, art, politics, history, books, travel... Anything I see new, I'm into it. I'm not amazing at all of them, but I'm curious enough to keep jumping in. You could say I'm a jack of many trades (except love, I got skipped on that module, and honestly, I'm fine with that).

This site is where I document and share pieces of me. Right now, it's mostly blogs. But soon, you'll see more things I've built, ideas I have, random thoughts, maybe even things I'm still figuring out. It's all a work in progress. Just like me.
